issue.title: www.kinopoisk.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

issue.title: The description of Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List should warn about changing websites' appearance
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Mac ### AdGuard version 2.8.1.1140 release (CL-1.9.62, DNS-1.7.22) ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? the problem is with app, not a site ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? many websites ### What filters do you have enabled? Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List includes Dandelion Sprout's Website Stretcher, which is a very opnionated list that alters the look of many websites. Most narrow webpages are narrow because it's easier to read, not because "[many websites still think that everyone are using narrow monitors](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DandelionSprout/adfilt/master/Dandelion%20Sprout's%20Website%20Stretcher.txt)". This list shouldn't be embedded in a annoyance filter in the first place. However, if it has to, the description should warn the user that the filter alters websites' looks and may break them. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1: With Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List on, GitHub's profile page slightly broken
Screenshot 2: With Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List off
### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: top.gg
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://top.gg/bot/432610292342587392/vote](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftop.gg%2Fbot%2F432610292342587392%2Fvote) ### Comment > Top.gg is a site where you vote for a bot daily and receive certain perks or benefits from it on discord while playing the game that that bot offers. AdGuard used to be phenomenal in blocking out those ads and allowing me to skip straight to voting, but now I have to wait for an ad that doesn't even show up to end before I can vote and move on. It is time consuming and more than a little annoying, particularly annoying that ads were implemented in the first place when all users want to do is show support for the bots they like. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/eRwpdH1.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.8.10 Browser: | Safari Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection Other extensions used: | AdBlock Plus

comment.body:
On my end player works with these rules:
`womenshealth.de#%#AG_onLoad(function(){if(window.location.href.includes("consent")){var g=new MutationObserver(function(){var b=document.querySelector('button[title^="Accept and continue"]');if(!b){var b=document.querySelector('button[title^="Akzeptieren und weiter"]');};b&&(g.disconnect(),b.click())});g.observe(document,{childList:!0,subtree:!0});setTimeout(function(){g.disconnect()},1E4)}});`
with unblocking/redirect for German filter
```
@@||cdn.stroeerdigitalgroup.de/metatag/live/mps_womenshealth/metaTag.min.js$domain=womenshealth.de
||cdn.stroeerdigitalgroup.de/metatag/live/mps_womenshealth/metaTag.min.js$script,redirect=noopjs,domain=womenshealth.de,important
```

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.quora.com/I-discharged-my-friend-s-laptop-once-by-mistake-He-claims-this-would-significantly-decrease-the-battery-life-and-wants-me-to-offer-to-buy-his-laptop-Is-this-a-reasonable-request/answer/Steve-Jones-118](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.quora.com%2FI-discharged-my-friend-s-laptop-once-by-mistake-He-claims-this-would-significantly-decrease-the-battery-life-and-wants-me-to-offer-to-buy-his-laptop-Is-this-a-reasonable-request%2Fanswer%2FSteve-Jones-118) ### Comment Username: @infinitewaveparticle > Please ignore the screenshots. This device doesn't allow screenshots (why you require them for every device is beyond me). I can take photos using another device and send them to devteam if you need them. > Anyway, quora.com used to be HTTPS filtered just fine... now when I open it on any of my browsers that support HTTPS filtering on this device (Android 5.1.1) it is no longer filtered. It simply opens as if HTTPS filtering was disabled while all other websites filter properly. It is not in my HTTPS filtering whitelist. ### Screenshots

issue.body:

- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;

### Problem description

Hello,

as you may know Google is added Origin Trials: Topics API and First "Locally-Executed Decision over Groups" Experiment (FLEDGE) in the last version of chromium-base browsers. It is possible to block or suppress somehow via rules?

Thank you.
Best regards.

### Proposed solution

As I recall you already did it something similar for FloC early🙂

### Additional information

_No response_

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://signin.aws.amazon.com/signin?redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Feu-west-2.console.aws.amazon.com%2Fconsole%2Fhome%3FhashArgs%3D%2523%26isauthcode%3Dtrue%26nc2%3Dh_ct%26region%3Deu-west-2%26src%3Dheader-signin%26state%3DhashArgsFromTB_eu-west-2_787abd824b28d1b3&client_id=arn%3Aaws%3Asignin%3A%3A%3Aconsole%2Fcanvas&forceMobileApp=0&code_challenge=pkaS7iFwqHyT0cWGHSj4iVRP3JMjaedVDa1l7pKN3qg&code_challenge_method=SHA-256](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsignin.aws.amazon.com%2Fsignin%3Fredirect_uri%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Feu-west-2.console.aws.amazon.com%252Fconsole%252Fhome%253FhashArgs%253D%252523%2526isauthcode%253Dtrue%2526nc2%253Dh_ct%2526region%253Deu-west-2%2526src%253Dheader-signin%2526state%253DhashArgsFromTB_eu-west-2_787abd824b28d1b3%26client_id%3Darn%253Aaws%253Asignin%253A%253A%253Aconsole%252Fcanvas%26forceMobileApp%3D0%26code_challenge%3DpkaS7iFwqHyT0cWGHSj4iVRP3JMjaedVDa1l7pKN3qg%26code_challenge_method%3DSHA-256) ### Comment Username: @antoine1293 > When Adguard is turned on with my current setting, it blocks me from signing in to AWS management console ( aws.amazon.com) this happens both in Google Chrome and Safari and i am able to access my AWS account normally on any other devices. > I can see that AWS allows me to log in, however within seconds it will log me out and send me back to the login screen. > from looking at the network development tool in google chrome it looks as if AWS is trying to authenticate it sends an authentication request, but then adguard seems to kick in and interrupt some requests (I'm not sure exactly what they were doing) which seems to trigger AWS to redirect me to the login screen to reenter my details. > I believe it could have something to do with the way that AWS redirects users after logging in (first from signin.aws.amazon.com, then to the individual subdomain represented by the availability zone associated with the account. > Note the screenshots are not very useful as they do not show the real error which is the login issue, and i cannot send screenshots of google chrome's network developer tools without sharing personal details related to logging in > Also worth clarifying that the link where this issue occurred is individually generated for every login, however, the button to access the AWS login page, where this issue occurs, can be accessed on https://aws.amazon.com/ by clicking the "Sign in to console" button ### Screenshots

labels.name: List-KR
labels.description: Problematic issues, handled in List-KR

issue.body:
# 나무위키의 파워링크 및 기타 광고 차단을 위한 지침

최근 나무위키에서 지속적인 파워링크 필터 대응에 따라 많은 광고 차단기 필터들이 재대응을 목표로 하고 있습니다.
빠른 대응 속도에 광고 차단기의 필터 업데이트 속도가 따라가지 못해 현재 많은 수의 오차단이 발생하고 있습니다.

즉, 저희가 필터를 업데이트하여도 실제로 여러분의 광고 차단기는 업데이트를 제때 받지 못할 수도 있다는 문제점이 있습니다.

더욱 효과적인 차단을 위해 아래 사항을 권고드립니다.

## 광고 차단기의 설정을 업데이트하여 필터 업데이트 속도 개선

<details>
AdGuard나 여타 광고 차단기에서의 빠른 필터 업데이트를 위해 기존 필터 목록에서 List-KR을 제외하고 사용자 지정 필터 목록에 List-KR을 신뢰된 필터로 추가하세요.

### Windows, Android 및 웹 브라우저 확장 프로그램 (Safari 제외)

- https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/236#issue-1168415899

### iOS 및 macOS의 AdGuard for Safari

아래 글을 참고하여 추가로 필터 패치가 필요합니다.

- https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/236#issuecomment-1084964861
</details>

## 광고가 차단되지 않았을 때 / 잘못 차단되었을 때

<details>
나무위키의 차단은 현재 IP 대역 및 기타 환경에 따라 다르게 보일 수 있다고 추정하고 있습니다.
광고가 정상적으로 차단되지 않은 경우에는 **로그인 여부** 및 **사용하시는 통신사** 등의 환경을 추가로 댓글에 기입해주시면 더 나은 대응이 가능합니다.
또 차단되지 않은 페이지의 DOM 구조 또한 파악이 필요한데 사용하시는 웹 브라우저에서 우클릭 후 웹 사이트 저장을 통해 추가 정보를 업로드해주시면 감사하겠습니다.

개인정보가 포함된 경우 Thunderbird 등의 메일 암호화 서비스를 통하여 아래의 지원 이메일 주소 중 하나로 암호화된 메일을 전송해주십시오.

- https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/223

> 그 외 타 광고 차단 필터를 사용하면 DOM 구조가 정상적으로 표지되지 않을 수 있으니 광고 차단기를 끄고 저장해주세요.
</details>

## 성능 문제의 발생

<details>
저희는 현재 이미 경우에 따라 성능 문제가 발생할 수 있음을 인지하고 있습니다.
성능 문제는 광고 차단기의 나무위키의 DOM을 검사하는 과정에서 패턴을 인식하는데에 과도한 리소스가 사용되어 발생하는 것입니다.
이는 장기적인 목표로 해결되어야 하지만 단기적으로 빠른 차단을 위해 발생할 수 있습니다.
성능 문제로 인해 불편을 감수하시는 경우 현재 레포지토리의 최근 커밋 목록을 참조하여 필터 규칙을 따로 비활성화할 수 있도록 하십시오.

규칙을 비활성화하려면 `namu.wiki#@#`로 시작하는 규칙을 사용자 규칙에 추가하면 됩니다.

### 직접 광고를 차단하기

이 때에는 직접 광고를 차단하실 수 있도록 사용하시는 광고 차단기에서 **직접 웹 사이트의 요소 차단** 기능을 이용하시는 것이 권장됩니다.

> 단, 현재 방식으로 생성된 규칙을 저장소에 전송하지 마세요. 나무위키의 구조는 무작위로 변경되는 특성이 있어 다른 사람에게 적용되지 않거나 너무 많이 업데이트해야 할 수도 있습니다.
</details>

_Originally posted by @seia-soto in https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/236#issuecomment-1086910452_

issue.title: The description of Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List should warn about changing websites' appearance
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Mac ### AdGuard version 2.8.1.1140 release (CL-1.9.62, DNS-1.7.22) ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? the problem is with app, not a site ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? many websites ### What filters do you have enabled? Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List [includes Dandelion Sprout's Website Stretcher](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/118103#issuecomment-1123525414), which is a very opnionated list that alters the look of many websites. Most narrow webpages are narrow because it's easier to read, not because "[many websites still think that everyone are using narrow monitors](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DandelionSprout/adfilt/master/Dandelion%20Sprout's%20Website%20Stretcher.txt)". This list shouldn't be embedded in a annoyance filter in the first place. However, if it has to, the description should warn the user that the filter alters websites' looks and may break them. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1: With Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List on, GitHub's profile page slightly broken
Screenshot 2: With Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List off
### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Worth noting:
1) You're in fact the 2nd person this week who've been confused about that sublist being included, which in turn has confused me.
2) Wider article bodies = More text/buttons visible at once before needing to scroll = Less window space wasted. This is especially the case on Wikia and Pixiv.
3) That's not what "Opinionated" means, especially with the theorethically very broad meaning the term "Annoyances" has taken on in the adblock community. "Opinionated" would've been if I started blocking Steven Universe sites in that list or anything like that.
